title: manava nilisuvadu
sahitya:
manava nilisuvadu bahu kaSTa haridADuvantha


caraNam 1    kAshig-hOgalu bahudu dEsha tirugalu bahudu Ase suTTante ira bahudu haridADuvantha
    caraNam 2    japava mADalu bahudu tapava mADalu bahudu upavAsa vrtadallira bahudu haridADuvantha
    caraNam 3    snAna mADalu bahudu mauna mADalu bahudu dhyanadi purandara viTTalana caraNadali haridADuvantha
